sentences.english: An international investigation said a North Korean torpedo sank the ship.
sentences.chinese: 一項國際調查顯示朝鮮的魚雷炸沉了天安艦。

sentences.english: To do this you should aim and set off the torpedo at the right moment.
sentences.chinese: 做這你應該正正地對準目標而且發出魚雷。

sentences.english: Thi provide the hip with an effective protection againt torpedoe attack.
sentences.chinese: 這對艦船抵禦魚雷攻擊提供了有效保護。

sentences.english: At the same time a new supercavitating torpedo power system is described.
sentences.chinese: 同時展望了新型的超空泡魚雷動力系統。

sentences.english: The system focuses on the counterwork stage between decoy and torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 該系統將目標定位於聲誘餌誘騙魚雷的對抗階段。

sentences.english: To launch a torpedo the ship has to be within firing range (in the game, this is approximately 1km).
sentences.chinese: 艦船要發射一杖魚雷必須在射程範圍內。

sentences.english: A semi-physical emulation system for torpedo's real-time control is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種魚雷實時控制半實物仿真系統。

sentences.english: The wire guidance enables torpedo to close into homing contact with the target.
sentences.chinese: 有線制導能夠使魚雷接近致自導引觸及目標。

sentences.english: When the vehicle reaches the preset speed, it begins to release t…
sentences.chinese: 載雷車達到預定速度後，釋放空投魚雷。

sentences.english: Nothing can withstand their torpedos for long.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼可以在它的魚雷前挺很久。

sentences.english: The corridor leading to the mine and torpedo part and to the fuel storage.
sentences.chinese: 這條通道通向水雷和魚雷零件庫以及燃料儲存庫。

sentences.english: The hardware - in -the-loop simulation platform is presented for networked torpedo control system.
sentences.chinese: 論文提出了網絡化魚雷控制系統半實物仿真平臺。

sentences.english: Therefore it can be used in design of guidance law for torpedo and anti-torpedo torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 該結果可廣泛應用於魚雷及反魚雷的導引律設計。

sentences.english: Therefore it can be used in design of guidance law for torpedo and anti-torpedo torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 該結果可廣泛應用於魚雷及反魚雷的導引律設計。

sentences.english: As it taxied towards the tug the pilot released his torpedo .
sentences.chinese: 飛行員駕機滑向拖輪，隨後投了魚雷。

sentences.english: The non-design condition parameters of torpedo turbine engine were also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對魚雷處於非設計工況時的參數進行了分析。

definition: Yasukuni Shrine, Shinto shrine in Tokyo to Japanese war dead, controversial as burial ground of several Class A war criminals
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
